EmailTemplate.name: Learning Plan Phase III: Salesforce Basics Classic
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Started with Salesforce! Learning Plan Phase III - Salesforce Basics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Start Learning Salesforce!
As you build your knowledge, we challenge you to capitalize on all of the resources you have at your disposal. This is an opportunity for you to advance your learning at your own pace.
The Global Training Team has developed this self-directed and self-paced Learning Plan to get you started with Salesforce.
Your Phase III Learning Plan can be found here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cG-waMuWPahwKWzOSWBN38wrAPGkgslH7uLB6B1DS_I/copy
Within the next few weeks, review the Learning Plan and complete the Knowledge Check https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc0zGoMWhOkbmkliYvMwyRzs4uLbFMpFI3ZwVcO7a06a0uQNA/viewform to ensure your comprehension of the content.
Thank You, {!User.Name}
WEX University Global Training
